term: What is the purpose of the federalists scrambling like this?
content:
recall that the federalists want to expand the government. they pass the judiciary act of 1801, which irritates the DRs already
but then the federalists are going to scramble during these months to fill those 16 newly created federal judge positions
	they were in such a rush to get the judges appointed that adams stayed up until midnight on the last day of his presidency to get judges approved
